thread.title: The Beast D Takes Electric ATV's to the Next Level
thread.title_full: The Beast D Takes Electric ATV's to the Next Level - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The Beast D Takes Electric ATV's to the Next Level
text:
Daymak Inc.
TORONTO , Oct. 21, The Beast is getting an overhaul and increasing its power to take complete control off-road. The two wheel electric all-terrain vehicle just got better with The Beast D that will feature a dual 500W Motor, and the Daymak Drive controller to the already powerful Daymak Beast. The Beast D will come with the 60V20ah Lithium Ion upgraded battery. And most importantly the Beast D is custom built in Canada !
The Daymak Beast D – All Terrain, anytime!
The Beast D is the perfect vehicle to take with you in the outback, hunting, camping and more. With the solar panel battery, you simply can leave the Beast D wherever you are and it will recharge itself for the way back home. The Beast D, unlike the standard version comes with a dual brushless DC motor that can go up to speeds of 50 km/h. The Beast D, strictly for off-road use oppose to the other versions. The Beast D also allows you to turn off one of the motors in case you need to conserve power.
The MSRP of The Beast D's is at $4299 , for a dual motor ATV which is only a $1300 increase from the Beast Deluxe.
Climb mountains with ease with The Beast D ebike
With added power you can climb at a much higher incline. The Beast D can climb hills of up to 36 degrees, which is a staggering 80% increase from the Beast Ultimate . This makes going through rough terrain a breeze and with the dual leg kick stand you can leave at the highest point of your trek and not be concerned that it comes rolling down the other way. The Beast D allows you to reach heights that you would never imagine with a conventional ATV!
And the initial reviews for the Beast D have been more than impressive
"Compared to an ATV, you just get more" – Michael C
"Beast D is a class above your run of the mill ATV and at a fraction of the price. The mobility and utility is enough to sell it on its own, with the dual motor Beast D, with both front and rear wheeled drive its' perfect for the cottage. You make your own trails and you don't have to worry about things like noise or gas" – Donovan W
The Beast D is available now . For more information and full specs on the Beast D or to order now, you can go to http:// www.daymakbeast.com
